title: Change hero section text to black color

requirements.text: In the HeroSection component, change the text color of the company name ('Gadin Technologies'), the tagline ('Nature's Finest Foxnuts, Delivered Worldwide'), and the description paragraph ('We source and export premium-grade foxnuts...') to black.

quotes:
Make this text in black color -Gadin Technologies
Nature's Finest Foxnuts, Delivered Worldwide

We source and export premium-grade foxnuts (makhana) from the heartlands of India, bringing the finest quality to international markets with uncompromising standards.

acceptanceCriteria: The company name 'Gadin Technologies' in the hero section is rendered in black.
The tagline 'Nature's Finest Foxnuts, Delivered Worldwide' in the hero section is rendered in black.
The description paragraph starting with 'We source and export premium-grade foxnuts...' in the hero section is rendered in black.
No other text colors on the page are affected by this change.

constraints: Only change text colors in the HeroSection component â€” do not alter layout, typography size, or other styling.
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Changing text colors in any section other than the hero section.
Modifying CTA button styles or colors.
